translation:
Friend Inácio

I have now obtained the adjoining permit and with it sent the said gentleman to our friend Abreu, and that he pass by here so I can write. When Inocêncio or the carts return, I will tell you about the flours whatever occurs.

Your sincere friend and thanks  
Almeida  
Piratini, November 7, 1838.
